LinguistFlow

Notion Integration

Configure your API key, database, and translation fallback.

Quick Tips

  • Database should contain Word (title), Definition (rich_text), Context (rich_text), Grammar (select), Status (status/select).
  • Enable YouTube captions to populate the overlay and allow selection.
  • If Google Translate is not configured, LinguistFlow will attempt Gemini Nano (window.ai) if available.
